Room.Name: Tropical Beach of Uland
Room.ShortDescription: You are on a snow white beach on a tropical island, below some sand cliffs.
Room.LongDescription: The beach stretches around the island, out of sight, while above you is a sandy cliff that might be difficult to climb. There seems to be a jungle up there, as you see cocanut trees and palms growing up on the high ground above the sand. The surf rolls in with a crashing noise and runs up the beach, wiping out your footprints.
